{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16657v1", "title": "A new characterization of Sobolev spaces on Lipschitz differentiability
  spaces", "summary": "We prove a new characterization of metric Sobolev spaces, in the spirit of
Brezis--Van Schaftingen--Yung's asymptotic formula. A new feature of our work
is that we do not need Poincar\'e inequality which is a common tool in the
literature. Another new feature is that we find a direct link between
Brezis--Van Schaftingen--Yung's asymptotic formula and Cheeger's Lipschitz
differentiability.", "main_category": "math.FA", "categories": "math.FA,math.MG", "published": "2025-04-23T12:24:33Z"}
